milestones.title: Planning & Design
milestones.description: Requirements gathering, user story creation, UI/UX design, architecture design, and technology stack finalization. | Deliverables: Detailed project plan, User stories and use cases, UI/UX design mockups and prototypes, System architecture diagram, Technology stack documentation, Database schema

milestones.title: Core Feature Development (MVP)
milestones.description: Development of core features for the MVP: User registration, restaurant listings, basic order placement, and payment gateway integration. | Deliverables: Functional user registration and profile management, Restaurant listing module with menu display, Basic order placement functionality, Integrated payment gateway (sandbox environment), API documentation for core features

milestones.title: Advanced Feature Development & MVP Refinement
milestones.description: Development of advanced features: Real-time order tracking, GPS integration, push notifications, rating and review system, and admin dashboard. Refinement of MVP based on initial testing. | Deliverables: Real-time order tracking functionality, GPS integration for delivery tracking, Push notification implementation, Rating and review system for restaurants, Admin dashboard for restaurant management, Bug fixes and performance improvements based on MVP testing.

milestones.title: Beta Testing & Bug Fixing
milestones.description: Comprehensive beta testing on iOS and Android platforms. Addressing identified bugs and performance issues. | Deliverables: Beta testing reports, Bug fixes and code improvements, Performance optimization, Updated technical documentation

milestones.title: Deployment & App Store Submission
milestones.description: Deployment to production environment, final testing, app store submission (iOS and Android). | Deliverables: Deployment package (iOS and Android), App store submission (iOS and Android), User training materials, Final technical documentation

tasks.title: Requirements Gathering
tasks.description: Collect and document project requirements from stakeholders

tasks.title: Market Research
tasks.description: Research market trends, competitors, and user needs

tasks.title: System Architecture Design
tasks.description: Design overall system architecture and component interactions

tasks.title: Database Design
tasks.description: Design database schema and data models

tasks.title: UI/UX Design
tasks.description: Create user interface mockups and user experience flows

tasks.title: Backend API Development
tasks.description: Develop core backend APIs and business logic

tasks.title: Frontend Development
tasks.description: Implement user interface and frontend functionality

tasks.title: Database Implementation
tasks.description: Set up database and implement data access layer

tasks.title: Unit Testing
tasks.description: Write and execute unit tests for all components

tasks.title: Integration Testing
tasks.description: Test integration between different system components

tasks.title: User Acceptance Testing
tasks.description: Conduct UAT with stakeholders and end users

tasks.title: Production Environment Setup
tasks.description: Set up production infrastructure and deployment pipeline

tasks.title: Deployment & Go-Live
tasks.description: Deploy application to production and monitor launch

tasks.title: Post-Launch Support
tasks.description: Monitor system performance and provide immediate support
